title: 1920x1080 problems
body:
When I put my game to *1920x1080 it makes the screen have a whitish tint, is that supposed to happen?
I usually use 1680x1050 but it is not its native setting
Also is 1920x1080 better for your eyes then 1680x1050
Thx

replies.body: Well, we're not optometrists so I can't comment on which is best for your eyes, but that white tint definitely sounds annoying. I'd try going into a Custom game and, after swapping to 1920x1080, close the game then restarting it to see if it maintains that color. Ultimately, you may want to ticket our Tech Support team [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to take a closer look into this; it's the first time I've ever heard of that happening. o_O
